Rock Art of the Mediterranean Basin on the Iberian Peninsula Edit

Last modified: Jan 21, 2024

List of Rock Art Sites of the Mediterranean Basin on the Iberian Peninsula from UNESCO World Heritage website.


Files

  • Rock_Art_of_the_Mediterranean_Basin_on_the_Iberian_Peninsula.gpkg gpkg (Details)
  • Rock_Art_of_the_Mediterranean_Basin_on_the_Iberian_Peninsula.csv csv (Details)


Original sources

Original data by UNESCO’s World Heritage Centre / UNESCO - World Heritage Online Map Platform


Attribution text

This work is based on data by UNESCO’s World Heritage Centre

A-GeoCat is a geospatial open data catalog developed and maintained by Alfobre.

Alfobre (portuguese for seedbed) is a collective devoted to the creation and development of projects, strategies and products in the Heritage field.
